name: Prehistoric Shifter
description:
Our un-complete, buggy game made for Ludum Dare 35. This was our first Ludum Dare and we didn't have much experience with the tools and constantly ran into problems. But hey, at least we made something.

If you stay in one form for too long, you start losing health.

===CONTROLS===

Arrow keys to move

C to spawn an enemy

Space to attack

1-3 to shapeshift into a different form

G to turn godmode on/off
